infobox.Japanese title:: 円谷光彦の探偵ノート  (Tsuburaya Mitsuhiko no Tantei Nōto)

infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima, Wataru Takagi  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Fuminori Komatsu as Chuya Makishima  Emiko Takeuchi as Part-time worker  Aki Kanada as Mariko Sakuragawa  Nobuyuki Kobushi as Robber

sections.People:
- 35 years old
- Makishima's Pizza shop manager
- 40 years old
- Customer
- Part-time worker
- Makishima's Pizza shop clerk
- Victim (bludgeoned - injured)
- Robber
sections.Resolution:
The detective boys found the last pizza box from Mariko Sakuragawa at her apartment before the robber appears and hold Mitsuhiko hostage, but Conan appears to kick the ball at the robber as Mariko reveals the tenth stolen diamond and gives it to them.

- Robber
sections.Trivia:
- Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya's Detective Notes 2 is the sequel of this episode.
- The Adventure of the Six Napoleons is a Sherlock Holmes short story which was referenced in this episode.
- The animation of Conan kicking ball is the same as the one used in opening 55.
